abstract: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to seek more time to find other partners or persuade Microsoft to raise its offer.
snippet: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to seek more time to find other partners or persuade Microsoft to raise its offer.
lead_paragraph: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to put a little more time on the clock.

headline.main: Yahoo Looks at New Way to Survive
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Seeks Way to Block Microsoft

abstract: In a move that could delay a proxy contest, Yahoo said it was extending the deadline for nominating directors to its board.
snippet: In a move that could delay a proxy contest, Yahoo said it was extending the deadline for nominating directors to its board.
lead_paragraph: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo is trying to put a little more time on the clock.

headline.main: Yahoo Seeks Way to Block Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Seeks Way to Block Microsoft

abstract: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to put a little more time on the clock.
lead_paragraph: As it scrambles to avoid defeat in its battle with Microsoft, Yahoo may try to put a little more time on the clock.

headline.main: Yahoo Looks at New Way to Survive

abstract: Jerry Yang, the chief executive of Yahoo, reached out to the rank and file Wednesday to explain Yahoo’s decision to postpone a deadline tied to its annual shareholder meeting — a move that gives it more time to maneuver ahead of a potential proxy fight with Microsoft, whose takeover bid Yahoo rejected last month.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Yang, the chief executive of Yahoo, reached out to the rank and file Wednesday to explain Yahoo’s decision to postpone a deadline tied to its annual shareholder meeting — a move that gives it more time to maneuver ahead of a potential proxy fight with Microsoft, whose takeover bid Yahoo rejected last month.

headline.main: With Deadline Eased, Yahoo Gives an Update

abstract: Yahoo‘s announcement Wednesday that it would delay its nominations deadline poses an interesting question for Microsoft. Does Microsoft wait until the announcement of the meeting date and the nominations deadline to start a proxy contest or does it attempt to nudge Yahoo by nominating directors beforehand (i.e., now)?
lead_paragraph: Yahoo‘s announcement Wednesday that it would delay its nominations deadline poses an interesting question for Microsoft. Does Microsoft wait until the announcement of the meeting date and the nominations deadline to start a proxy contest or does it attempt to nudge Yahoo by nominating directors beforehand (i.e., now)?
